revisionDesc.change: Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Add relevant tablet divs
Submit - I corrected line breaks at lines: 2, 4, 5, 6, 7, 9, 13, 15, 18, 19, 20, 21, 25. I deleted a wrong "a" at line 7 (I corrected "unt a ampridie" into "unt ampridie").
batch converted all tei:sic to tei:orig and tei:corr to tei:reg
changed schema; added xml:space=preserve; indented; moved title/@n to idno
Converted from TEI P4 (EpiDoc DTD v. 6) to P5 (EpiDoc RNG schema)
